name: music
summary: Voice-channel music (agent-backed, one session per voice channel)
description: Up to 49 concurrent sessions — one per voice channel, running simultaneously across the server. Play tracks from YouTube, Spotify, or SoundCloud by search or URL. Full queue management, looping, shuffle, volume control, lyrics, and seeking. Backed by the Agent Pool for maximum uptime.

subcommandsRich.desc: Search or URL — YouTube, Spotify, SoundCloud

subcommandsRich.desc: Remove a specific track from the queue

subcommandsRich.desc: Loop the current track or entire queue

subcommandsRich.desc: Jump to a timestamp in the current track

subcommandsRich.name: lyrics
subcommandsRich.desc: Fetch lyrics for the current track

summary: ⚡ Configure the XP and leveling system for this server

name: automations
summary: Trigger scripts automatically on server events.
description: Configure event-triggered automations — run a sequence when someone joins, leaves, boosts, reaches a level, or any other server event. Automations can call scripts, assign roles, send messages, update economy values, or dispatch agents. Build complex server logic without writing code.

subcommandsRich.name: add
subcommandsRich.desc: Create a new trigger → action automation

name: scripts
summary: Create and run safe automation scripts
description: Build fully programmable server automations with named scripts. Scripts can chain commands, reference variables, trigger conditionally, and be called by other automations or custom commands. The most powerful programmability tool in Chopsticks — turns the bot into a configurable server platform.

subcommandsRich.name: create
subcommandsRich.desc: Write a reusable script with commands and logic

subcommandsRich.name: list
subcommandsRich.desc: List all scripts configured for this server

name: setup
summary: Guided wizard to configure key bot modules.
description: The master configuration command for your server. Controls mod log channel, mod roles, agent pool configuration, economy settings, raid/nuke protection thresholds, dynamic voice channel creation, welcome messages, and auto-roles. Run /setup once when you add Chopsticks — everything else flows from here.

name: poll
summary: Create a timed poll with automatic result reveal
description: Posts an embedded poll that members vote on with reactions. Supports up to 10 options. Results show in real time.

name: remind
summary: Set a personal reminder.
description: Sends you a DM or channel ping after the specified duration. Useful for anything you don't want to forget mid-conversation.

name: snipe
summary: Show the last deleted or edited message in this channel
description: Show the last deleted or edited message in this channel

subcommandsRich.name: clear
subcommandsRich.desc: Clear the snipe cache for this channel (moderators only)

name: stats
summary: 📊 View server stats, leaderboards, and achievements
description: 📊 View server stats, leaderboards, and achievements

subcommandsRich.name: me
subcommandsRich.desc: View your stats in this server

subcommandsRich.name: achievements
subcommandsRich.desc: View your or another user's achievements

name: statschannel
summary: Configure auto-updating stats voice channels
description: Configure auto-updating stats voice channels

subcommandsRich.name: set
subcommandsRich.desc: Set a voice channel to display a specific stat

name: suggest
summary: Submit a suggestion to the server's suggestions channel
description: Submit a suggestion to the server's suggestions channel

name: tag
summary: Manage and retrieve server tags
description: Manage and retrieve server tags

subcommandsRich.name: set
subcommandsRich.desc: Create or update a tag [requires Manage Server]

subcommandsRich.name: list
subcommandsRich.desc: List all tags in this server

name: theme
summary: Customize how the bot looks and behaves in this server
description: Customize how the bot looks and behaves in this server

subcommandsRich.name: name
subcommandsRich.desc: Set a custom persona name for the bot in this server

subcommandsRich.name: footer
subcommandsRich.desc: Set a custom embed footer text

subcommandsRich.name: feature
subcommandsRich.desc: Enable or disable a feature module for this server

subcommandsRich.name: preview
subcommandsRich.desc: Preview the current theme for this server

subcommandsRich.name: reset-colors
subcommandsRich.desc: Reset all colors to the bot's default palette

subcommandsRich.name: reset
subcommandsRich.desc: Reset the entire theme (all customizations) for this server

name: tutorials
summary: Interactive tutorials and quick-start control center
description: Interactive tutorials and quick-start control center

name: uptime
summary: Show bot uptime
description: Show bot uptime

name: weather
summary: Current weather for any location (powered by Open-Meteo, no API key needed)
description: Current weather for any location (powered by Open-Meteo, no API key needed)
